Inside Macintosh: Imaging With QuickDraw /
Chapter 8 - Cursor Utilities / Cursor Utilities Reference
Routines

Changing Black-and-White Cursors

When you use the InitCursor procedure described on page 8-20, the cursor changes from a wristwatch to an arrow. You can change the cursor to another shape by using the GetCursor function to load another cursor into memory and then using the SetCursor procedure to display it on the screen.

Subtopics
GetCursor
SetCursor
